lead_paragraph: A French Open champion at long last, and the first man in nearly a half-century to win four consecutive major championships, Novak Djokovic grabbed a racket and etched a heart in the very red clay that had given him such heartache in the past.
snippet: A French Open champion at long last, and the first man in nearly a half-century to win four consecutive major championships, Novak Djokovic grabbed a racket and etched a heart in the very red clay that had given him such heartache in the past....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Finally Wins French Open for 4th Major in Row
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Finally Wins French Open for 4th Major in Row
